alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of Snow, mainly light. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin including Dubois and Crowheart. The heaviest snow will be around Crowheart. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will be slick and hazardous in spots, but become difficult especially this morning southeast of Crowheart. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will likely melt on paved surfaces by midday. This will result in roads becoming wet by around midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
